PHRASE.LANG: LMO - MIB™ La Moto de Boris

What could be more fun than rolling around Home on a motorcycle? Locomotion inspired by the bike ridden by Boris from Men in Black™ III and the video game Men in Black: Alien Crisis™, you can almost hear the engine growl as it hugs the curves! [#Legal]
Franchement, il n'y a rien de plus sympa que de se balader dans Home à moto! [#Legal]
Was könnte schöner sein, als auf einem Motorrad durchs Haus zu fahren? [#Legal]
Cosa c'è di più divertente di gironzolare per Home in moto? [#Legal]
¿Hay algo más divertido que pasearte por tu espacio en monociclo? [#Legal]
